mapper.select: SELECT tu.id AS id, tu.officialAccountId AS officialaccountid, tu.nickname AS nickname, tu.mobile AS mobile, tu.station AS station, tu.create_date AS createDate, tu.update_date AS updateDate, tu.type AS TYPE, tu.delete_flag AS deleteFlag, tu.school_parent_id AS schoolParentId, tu.staff_id AS staffId, tu.description AS description FROM tb_user tu WHERE openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tu.delete_flag = 0

SELECT tmp3.*,tsc.title AS schooltitle FROM (SELECT tmp1.*,tmp0.id FROM (SELECT tu.* FROM tb_user tu WHERE tu.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tu.type = 30 AND tu.delete_flag = 0 ) AS tmp0, (SELECT ts.id AS studentId, ts.name AS NAME, tsp.parent_id AS parentId, tsp.school_id AS schoolId FROM tb_student ts, tb_student_parent tsp WHERE ts.id = tsp.student_id) tmp1 WHERE tmp0.school_parent_id = tmp1.parentId AND tmp0.student_id=tmp1.studentId) tmp3 LEFT JOIN tb_school tsc ON tmp3.schoolId = tsc.id

SELECT tu.id, tu.staff_id AS staffId, sc.id AS schoolId, sc.title AS schoolName, sc.address,sc.phone FROM tb_staff st, tb_school sc, tb_user tu WHERE tu.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tu.type = 31 AND tu.delete_flag = 0 AND tu.staff_id = st.id AND st.school_id = sc.id ORDER BY st.id

SELECT tu.id, s.id AS staffId, tc.id AS classId, tc.title AS className, sc.id AS schoolId, sc.title AS schoolName FROM tb_staff s, tb_school sc, tb_user tu, tb_class tc, tb_staff_class tsc WHERE tu.type = 32 AND tu.openid = #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tu.staff_id = s.id AND tu.delete_flag = 0 AND s.school_id = sc.id AND tsc.class_id = tc.id AND tsc.staff_id = s.id

SELECT tb_student.*,tb_student_parent.*,tb_class.title AS classtitle,tb_school.title AS schooltitle FROM tb_student LEFT JOIN (SELECT tb_student_parent.* FROM tb_student_parent, tb_school_parent WHERE tb_school_parent.phone = #{parentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND tb_student_parent.parent_id = tb_school_parent.id) AS tb_student_parent ON tb_student_parent.student_id = tb_student.id LEFT JOIN tb_school_parent ON tb_school_parent.id = tb_student_parent.parent_id AND tb_school_parent.deleted = 0 LEFT JOIN tb_school ON tb_school.id = tb_student.school_id LEFT JOIN tb_class ON tb_class.id = tb_student.class_id WHERE tb_student.deleted = 0 AND tb_student_parent.deleted = 0 AND tb_class.deleted = 0 AND tb_school_parent.deleted = 0 AND tb_school.deleted = 0 ORDER BY tb_student.created DESC
